note.p: Birth: Boreland, in the Stewartry of Kirkcudbright, Dumfries and Galloway, Scotland (27 September 1824)
Career: Superintendent of the Kew Observatory of the British Association
AssocMaterial: CSAC 31/8/75. Papers deposited in Cambridge University Library
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1859-1860 vol 10 pp xxxiv-xxxviii
Notes: Leonard Horner has signed certificate twice
